title: Keybindings not working  in-game
body:
The keybindings are not working in-game on my keyboard or mouse I read a lot of people are having this problem. They would work after spamming the key around 8-10 times but the timing becomes off and impossible to combo. my game that I was playing I had to use my mouse and click each skill in order to even use them.  typing works just fine so it hat wasn't the problem and keybindings I other game work fine just league is messing up.  This was a pain cause all game I was being called noob, feeder and troll because of something that I had no control over I was even reported because if this.

Anyone know if this is a bug or something that can fix it?

replies.body: Do you notice any other behavior such as minions or champions moving awkwardly, teleporting around, or running in place? If not, did you go into the Hotkeys sections of the in-game settings and try resetting them to default before testing if they work in-game?
